short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: FIND and FIX security issues in your browsers, plugins and missing security updates on Mac OSX

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Qualys BrowserCheck will perform a security analysis of your browsers and plugins, and will run several system checks including the Top4 Security Controls.
